snippet: Manhattan’s luxury market saw a flow of activity in townhouses. Topping the list of sales was a mansion owned by the investor Andrew L. Farkas....

headline.main: South Africa's Zuma Won't Suspend Prosecutor Over Gordhan Charges
headline.print_headline: South Africa's Zuma Won't Suspend Prosecutor Over Gordhan Charges

lead_paragraph: Manhattan’s luxury market saw a flow of activity in townhouses. Topping the list of sales was a mansion owned by the investor Andrew L. Farkas.
